member.name: T:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult
member.summary: An abstract base class that implements the interface. Serves as a base class from which to derive objects that can be used for common asynchronous programming scenarios.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.#ctor
member.summary: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize an instance of the class that does not have a callback delegate or a state object.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.#ctor(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize an instance of the class that has a callback delegate and a state object.
member.param: The method to be called when the asynchronous operation completes.
A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize an instance of the class that does not have a callback delegate but does have a state object.
member.param: A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.AsyncState
member.summary: Gets a user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle
member.summary: Gets a that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
member.returns: A that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Complete(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Call this version of complete when your asynchronous operation is complete and no exception was encountered. It updates the state of the operation and notifies the callback.
member.param: true if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise false.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Complete(System.Boolean,System.Exception)
member.summary: Call this version of complete if you raise an exception during processing. In addition to notifying the callback, it captures the exception and stores it to be thrown during the call to the method.
member.param: true if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise false.
The exception that occurred during the processing of the asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.CompletedSynchronously
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.
member.returns: true if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called by the and methods to release the managed and unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the class.
member.param: true to release managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources. true indicates that this is an explicit call to Dispose.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.End(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Call this method when the End function for the asynchronous operation is complete. It ensures that the asynchronous operation is complete, and does some common validation.
member.param: The representing the status of the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Finalize
member.summary: Allows the object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.IsCompleted
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation has completed.
member.returns: true if the operation is complete; otherwise, false.

member.summary: An enumeration that lists the ways of validating a certificate.

member.name: F:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode.None
member.summary: No validation of the certificate is done.

member.name: F:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode.PeerTrust
member.summary: The certificate is valid if it is in the trusted people store.

member.name: F:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode.ChainTrust
member.summary: The certificate is valid if the chain builds to a certification authority in the trusted root store.

member.name: F:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode.PeerOrChainTrust
member.summary: The certificate is valid if it is in the trusted people store, or if the chain builds to a certification authority in the trusted root store.

member.name: F:System.ServiceModel.Security.X509CertificateValidationMode.Custom
member.summary: The user must plug in a custom to validate the certificate.
